import { ArrowLeftIcon, ArrowRightIcon, ClockIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' export default function TryoutTes() { const [open, setOPen] = useState(false) const [indexNumber, setIndexNumber] = useState(1) const [exam, setExam] = useState([]); const { option, question } = exam[indexNumber] || {} const ready = () => { Swal.fire({ title: 'Yakin Mulai Mengerjakan?', text: 'Pastikan koneksi internet anda bagus! dan Gunakan Browser Terbaru ', icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, delete it!' }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { setOPen(true) } }) } const getData = async () => { let { data } = await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/ujian/aa'); setExam(data.data) } const nextHandler = () => { setIndexNumber(indexNumber + 1) } const prevHandler = () => { setIndexNumber(indexNumber - 1) } const selectOption = (indexSelected, indexOptionSelected, value) => { setExam (exam.map((item, index) => index === indexSelected ? { ...item, selected: 1, option: option.map((item, index) => index === indexOptionSelected ? { ...item, selected: 1 } : { ...item, selected: 0 } ), } : item )) } useEffect(() => { const update = window.localStorage.getItem('open'); setOPen(JSON.parse(update)) const exam = window.localStorage.getItem('exam'); setExam(JSON.parse(exam)) }, []) useEffect(() => { getData(); window.localStorage.setItem('open', open); window.localStorage.setItem('exam', JSON.stringify(exam)); }, [open, exam]) console.log(exam); return (
